process.description: TCP4-2194 Process for the revision of web entry, send email, PDF generator
process.name: TCP4-2194 Process for the revision of web entry send email PDF generator
process.bpmn:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<bpmn:definitions xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns:bpmn="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL" xmlns:bpmndi="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/DI" xmlns:dc="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DC" xmlns:di="http://www.omg.org/spec/DD/20100524/DI" xmlns:pm="http://processmaker.com/BPMN/2.0/Schema.xsd" xmlns:tns="http://sourceforge.net/bpmn/definitions/_1530553328908" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" targetNamespace="http://bpmn.io/schema/bpmn" exporter="ProcessMaker Modeler" exporterVersion="1.0" xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.omg.org/spec/BPMN/20100524/MODEL http://bpmn.sourceforge.net/schemas/BPMN20.xsd">
  <bpmn:process id="ProcessId" name="ProcessName" isExecutable="true">
    <bpmn:startEvent id="node_1" name="Start Event" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignment="user" pm:assignedUsers="1" pm:assignedGroups="" pm:config="{"web_entry":{"require_valid_session":false,"screen_id":990,"completed_action":"URL","completed_screen_id":null,"completed_url":"about:blank","enable_query_params":false,"password":null,"enable_password_protect":false,"exclude_data":[],"embed":{"position":"full","title":"Form","icon":"question-circle","color":null}}}">
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_6</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:startEvent>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_3" name="Send Email" pm:config="{"emailServer":"","type":"text","subject":"Products","textBody":"Your order is being processed","screenRef":null,"users":[],"groups":[],"addEmails":["automation.pm4@gmail.com"],"attachments":[],"requestRecipients":[],"usersAndGroupsOptionSelected":false}" implementation="connector-send-email/processmaker-communication-email-send">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_17</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_23</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:endEvent id="node_4" name="End Event">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_21</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:incoming>node_23</bpmn:incoming>
    </bpmn:endEvent>
    <bpmn:serviceTask id="node_11" name="PDF Generator" pm:config="{"screenRef":991,"fileName":"Ordern"}" implementation="connector-pdf-print/processmaker-communication-pdf-print">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_19</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_21</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:serviceTask>
    <bpmn:parallelGateway id="node_13" name="Parallel Gateway" gatewayDirection="Diverging">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_15</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_17</bpmn:outgoing>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_19</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:parallelGateway>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_17" name="" sourceRef="node_13" targetRef="node_3"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_19" name="" sourceRef="node_13" targetRef="node_11"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_21" name="" sourceRef="node_11" targetRef="node_4"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_23" name="" sourceRef="node_3" targetRef="node_4"/>
    <bpmn:manualTask id="node_5" name="Manual Task" pm:screenRef="991" pm:allowInterstitial="false" pm:assignmentLock="false" pm:allowReassignment="false" pm:config="{"reactions":false,"voting":false,"edit_comments":false,"remove_comments":false}">
      <bpmn:incoming>node_6</bpmn:incoming>
      <bpmn:outgoing>node_15</bpmn:outgoing>
    </bpmn:manualTask>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_6" name="" sourceRef="node_1" targetRef="node_5"/>
    <bpmn:sequenceFlow id="node_15" name="" sourceRef="node_5" targetRef="node_13"/>
  </bpmn:process>
  <bpmndi:BPMNDiagram id="BPMNDiagramId">
    <bpmndi:BPMNPlane id="BPMNPlaneId" bpmnElement="ProcessId">
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_1_di" bpmnElement="node_1">
        <dc:Bounds x="450" y="140" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_3_di" bpmnElement="node_3">
        <dc:Bounds x="540" y="390" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_4_di" bpmnElement="node_4">
        <dc:Bounds x="430" y="530" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_11_di" bpmnElement="node_11">
        <dc:Bounds x="260" y="390" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_13_di" bpmnElement="node_13">
        <dc:Bounds x="450" y="340" width="36" height="36"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_17_di" bpmnElement="node_17">
        <di:waypoint x="468" y="358"/>
        <di:waypoint x="598" y="428"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_19_di" bpmnElement="node_19">
        <di:waypoint x="450" y="358"/>
        <di:waypoint x="318" y="428"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_21_di" bpmnElement="node_21">
        <di:waypoint x="318" y="428"/>
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="548"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_23_di" bpmnElement="node_23">
        <di:waypoint x="598" y="428"/>
        <di:waypoint x="448" y="548"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNShape id="node_5_di" bpmnElement="node_5">
        <dc:Bounds x="410" y="210" width="116" height="76"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNShape>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_6_di" bpmnElement="node_6">
        <di:waypoint x="468" y="158"/>
        <di:waypoint x="468" y="248"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
      <bpmndi:BPMNEdge id="node_15_di" bpmnElement="node_15">
        <di:waypoint x="468" y="248"/>
        <di:waypoint x="468" y="358"/>
      </bpmndi:BPMNEdge>
    </bpmndi:BPMNPlane>
  </bpmndi:BPMNDiagram>
</bpmn:definitions>

config.name: Variable Name
config.label: Variable Name
config.helper: A variable name is a symbolic name to reference information.

config.label: Label
config.helper: The label describes the field's name

config.name: Data Type
config.label: Data Type
config.helper: The data type specifies what kind of data is stored in the variable.

config.name: Data Format
config.label: Data Format
config.helper: The data format for the selected type.

config.label: Validation Rules
config.helper: The validation rules needed for this field

config.label: Placeholder Text
config.helper: The placeholder is what is shown in the field when no value is provided yet

config.label: Helper Text
config.helper: Help text is meant to provide additional guidance on the field's value

config.label: Text Color
config.helper: Set the element's text color

config.label: Background Color
config.helper: Set the element's background color

config.label: Default Value
config.helper: The default value is pre populated using the existing request data. This feature will allow you to modify the value displayed on screen load if needed.

config.label: Visibility Rule
config.helper: This control is hidden until this expression is true

config.label: Custom Format String
config.helper:
Use the Mask Pattern format
Date ##/##/####
SSN ###-##-####
Phone (###) ###-####

config.label: CSS Selector Name
config.helper: Use this in your custom css rules

config.label: Aria Label
config.helper: Attribute designed to help assistive technology (e.g. screen readers) attach a label

config.label: Tab Order
config.helper: Order in which a user will move focus from one control to another by pressing the Tab key
